title: Help
body:
I need help, I cant enter League since the patch of Evelyn, and now all it says is:

An unexpected error occurred while logging in. Please try again. If this issue persists contact support at support.riotgames.com

Please I need help

replies.body: Hey I'd like to help!  When exactly are you getting this error?  Toss me some more specifics and I'll do my best to assist!

What Happens is that I open up league, and then I put in my password, after waiting for like 5mins it says "An unexpected error occurred while logging in. Please try again. If this issue persists contact support at support.riotgames.com"

Or sometimes when I log in the league an it goes the the main client screen it will say "Trying to reconnect"
